entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 01:55 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 88 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
